titles.title: To amend the Ethics in Government Act of 1978 to require certain Tennessee Valley Authority employees to include their annual salary in annual disclosure reports, and for the other purposes.
To amend the Ethics in Government Act of 1978 to require certain Tennessee Valley Authority employees to include their annual salary in annual disclosure reports, and for the other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Reform.

bill.summary: This bill requires certain Tennessee Valley Authority officers and employees to include their total annual compensation in annual financial disclosure reports.
